skills.name: Wingflap
skills.desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Meiotic Division
skills.desc: Produces 1 spawn of itself. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turns.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.desc: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.
